title: How to Make Vegan Tangerine Fudge Brownie Cake

steps.headline: Start preheating the oven to 375ºF/190ºC as you line your baking pan with parchment paper.
Melt the chocolate chips and margarine over low heat in a saucepan.
steps.description: Once melted, leave aside to cool.

steps.headline: Add the dry ingredients to a mixing bowl.
Pour in the made-up egg replacer and whisk the ingredients together until combined well.
Pour in the melted chocolate/margarine mixture.
Add the tangerine juice and zest and mix through.
Pour the batter into the pan.
Place the cake in the oven and bake it for 30 minutes.
Remove the cake from the oven and allow it to cool at room temperature.
Take the cake out of the mold once cooled and set it on a serving dish.
Pour the ingredients for the fudge sauce into a saucepan.
Cook over low heat until all the ingredients melt together.
steps.description: It is important to stir continuously to prevent the sauce from burning.

steps.headline: Remove the fudge from the heat and leave it to cool once it's thoroughly combined.
Cut the cake into servings, plate and serve with a rich drizzle of the fudge sauce.

text: Preparing the Tangerine Fudge Cake Start preheating the oven to 375ºF/190ºC as you line your baking pan with parchment paper.  Melt the chocolate chips and margarine over low heat in a saucepan. Once melted, leave aside to cool. Add the dry ingredients to a mixing bowl.  Pour in the made-up egg replacer and whisk the ingredients together until combined well.  Pour in the melted chocolate/margarine mixture.  Add the tangerine juice and zest and mix through.  Pour the batter into the pan.  Place the cake in the oven and bake it for 30 minutes.  Remove the cake from the oven and allow it to cool at room temperature.  Take the cake out of the mold once cooled and set it on a serving dish.  Making the Fudge Sauce Pour the ingredients for the fudge sauce into a saucepan.  Cook over low heat until all the ingredients melt together. It is important to stir continuously to prevent the sauce from burning. Remove the fudge from the heat and leave it to cool once it's thoroughly combined.  Cut the cake into servings, plate and serve with a rich drizzle of the fudge sauce.  Finished.
